tribe_name: Habematolel Pomo of Upper Lake, California

awards.description: AWARD HABEMATOLEL UPPER LAKE FY2024 TRIBAL CLIMATE RESILIENCE FUNDING

THIS COOPERATIVE AGREEMENT PROVIDES FUNDING TO DEVELOP THE TRIBE'S ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAM. ACTIVITIES INCLUDE TRAINING STAFF, ATTENDING THE REGIONAL TRIBAL OPERATIONS COMMITTEE, ATTENDING THE TRIBAL/EPA ANNUAL CONFERENCE, ESTABLISHING A TRIBAL INTEGRATED SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT PROGRAM, CONDUCTING COMMUNITY OUTREACH, DEVELOPING A GEOGRAPHIC INFORMATION SYSTEM PROGRAM, AND DEVELOPING A WATER PROGRAM.  THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT PROVIDES FULL FEDERAL FUNDING IN THE AMOUNT OF $172,348.

DESCRIPTION:THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES ASSISTANCE TO THE HABEMATOLEL POMO OF UPPER LAKE TRIBE TO BUILD ITS CAPACITY TO ADMINISTER MULTI-MEDIA ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS ON INDIAN LANDS. DIRECT BENEFICIARIES OF THIS PROGRAM ARE THE MEMBERS AND/OR RESIDENTS OF THE HABEMATOLEL POMO OF UPPER LAKE TRIBE.

THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT PROVIDES FULL FEDERAL FUNDING IN THE AMOUNT OF $128,492.

ACTIVITIES:THE RECIPIENT WILL PROVIDE HAZMAT AND WATERSHED MANAGEMENT TRAINING TO ENVIRONMENTAL STAFF, CONDUCT OUTREACH THROUGH COMMUNITY EVENTS, NEWSLETTERS, FLIERS, AND SOCIAL MEDIA PUBLIC SAFETY ANNOUNCEMENTS, COMPLETE A HAZARDOUS WASTE ASSESSMENT, AND DRAFT PROCEDURES FOR NON-POINT SOURCE MANAGEMENT AND A DRAFT WETLAND PROGRAM PLAN.SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:ANTICIPATED DELIVERABLES AND OUTCOMES INCLUDE HAZWOPER AND WATERSHED MANAGEMENT CERTIFICATION FOR ENVIRONMENTAL STAFF, COPIES OF FLYERS AND OTHER OUTREACH PRODUCTS CREATED, A HAZARDOUS WASTE ASSESSMENT OF TRIBAL LANDS, FINALIZED PROTOCOL FOR NON-POINT SOURCE MANAGEMENT, AND A DRAFT WETLAND PROGRAM PLAN.

awards.awarding_agency: Department of Housing and Urban Development
